#  Investor Relations 

Welcome to Marriott International, Inc.'s Investor Relations Center. Whether you are a current or prospective shareholder of our company, this center has the most up-to-date information available on the company, its strategies and recent performance.

## Financial Information

Marriott International offers a wide variety of current and historical financial information.

  * [ Financial Press Releases](/press-releases)
  * [ Earnings Reports](/financial-information/quarterly-results)
  * [ SEC Filings ](/financial-information/sec-filings)
  * [ Financial Reports & Proxy ](/annual)



###### [Events & Presentations](/events-and-presentations)

Marriott's presentations and webcasts to the financial community

###### [Investor Fact Book](/investor-fact-book)

Find historical information on Marriott's Unit Counts and other operating statistics.

## Core Values & Heritage

Success Is Never Final

Our core values make us who we are. As we change and grow, the beliefs that are most important to us stay the same‚Äîputting people first, pursuing excellence, embracing change, acting with integrity and serving our world. Being part of Marriott International means being part of a proud history and a thriving culture.

[ Our Story: A Timeline of Innovation ](/about/culture-and-values/history.mi)

![eSSENTIAL Accessibility]()

#### Empowering people with Disabilities

Get the eSSENTIAL Accessibility assistive tecnology app, part of our commitment to inclusion. **[_Get the App_](https://www.essentialaccessibility.com/marriott/)‚Üó**

##  We Put People First 

![Marriott Associates in a photo shoot]()

###  "Take care of associates and they will take care of the customers." 

This is our founder‚Äôs philosophy and it has made Marriott International a great place to work for more than 95 years. Our people first culture has consistently earned us awards and recognition around the globe. Giving associates opportunities to grow and succeed is part of the company‚Äôs DNA.

[ Career Opportunities ](https://careers.marriott.com/ "Career Opportunities") Opens a new window

[ Diversity & Inclusion ](/diversity/diversity-and-inclusion.mi "Diversity & Inclusion")

[ Heart of the House ](http://stories.marriott.com/ "Heart of the House") Opens a new window

[ TakeCare Relief Fund ](/culture-and-values/takecare-relief-fund.mi "TakeCare Relief Fund")

##  We Pursue Excellence 

![3 ladies enjoying tea time]()

###  Our dedication to the customer shows in everything we do. 

Marriott‚Äôs reputation for superior customer service dates back to J. Willard Marriott‚Äôs original goal for his business: ‚Äúgood food and good service at a fair price.‚Äù We take pride in the details‚Äîevery day, in every destination worldwide. 

[ Our Brands ](/marriott-brands/explore-our-brands.mi "Our Brands ")

##  Diversity, Equity + Inclusion 

  * ![16 team members from diverse background in a group photo](https://cache.marriott.com/is/image/marriotts7prod/pdt-LandingPageBanner-462499042368575)



Infusing diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) into our DNA is integral to the Company‚Äôs success. Marriott International‚Äôs goal is to be a global, transformational leader in DEI, with actions serving as opportunities to instill a sense of belonging in all those who enter Marriott‚Äôs doors. 

Marriott‚Äôs approach to DEI starts at the top. Our Board-level Inclusion and Social Impact Committee (ISIC) provides oversight of Marriott‚Äôs strategy, efforts, and commitments related to our people-first culture, associate well-being and inclusion, and other environmental, social, and governance (ESG) matters.

Marriott‚Äôs DEI objectives include:

  * Creating an inclusive environment for associates, customers, guests, suppliers, and owners.
  * Increasing the presence of women and people of color at the vice president level and above.
  * Establishing a supportive and inclusive work environment where we recognize the whole person.



Learn about Marriott‚Äôs DEI successes:

  * [_A History Of Putting People First ‚Äì Our Holistic Approach_](/content/dam/marriott-digital/digitallegal-micorp-cec/en_us/micorp_diversity-and-inclusion/unlimited/document/assets/pdt-DEI-Infographic-845536176596042.pdf)‚Üó (PDF)
  * Marriott International is committed to transparency and open dialog on diversity, equity and inclusion.
  * [_Diversity Awards and Accomplishments_](http://news.marriott.com/recognition)‚Üó



![Marriott hotel associates gathered together]()

###  Associates 

Marriott strives to be a place where everyone is welcome and has the opportunity to succeed, learn, and grow. We hire for careers, not just jobs ‚Äî and work to create and maintain an inclusive culture where people are seen, heard, and belong.

[ More on Associates Open in New Tab ](/diversity/associates-diversity.mi)

![Guests queuing at hotel desk]()

###  Customers 

Marriott remains committed to engage diverse and socially driven consumers over our shared values and reinforce our commitment to diversity, inclusion, and social impact.

[ More on Customers Open in New Tab ](/diversity/customers-diversity.mi)

![Female and male suppliers shaking hands](https://cache.marriott.com/is/image/marriotts7prod/pdt-SupplierBanner-401413691525704)

###  Suppliers 

Marriott‚Äôs supplier diversity program is designed to expand the company‚Äôs global footprint with diverse-owned businesses, spur innovation, and inspire us all to do business better.

[ More on Suppliers Open in New Tab ](/diversity/suppliers-diversity.mi)

links.title: Corporate Social Responsibility
links.content:
![](https://serve360.marriott.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/Serve360-logo-horizontal.png)

# Today, business plays an increasingly critical role‚Ä¶

in taking on our world‚Äôs most pressing social, environmental and economic issues. With our size and scale, we have a global responsibility and a unique opportunity to be a force for good. Guided by our 2025 Sustainability and Social Impact Goals, as well as the UN Sustainable Development Goals, we commit to creating positive and sustainable impact wherever we do business.

[View 2025 Goals (PDF)](http://serve360.marriott.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/Serve-360-goals-page-tabloid_2-updated-20180916-English.pdf)

### NURTURE

[ Details Close ](#collapse-2114960178)

#### We believe in making the communities where we operate better places to live, work and visit.

To support the resiliency and sustainable development of these communities, we invest in the vitality of their children and natural resources, as well as deliver aid and support, especially in times of need.

[LEARN MORE](nurture)

### SUSTAIN

[ Details Close ](#collapse-256887457)

#### We have an even greater obligation to operate responsibly with our expanding global presence

While integrating sustainability across our value chain and mitigating climate-related risk, we are working to reduce our environmental impacts, build and operate sustainable hotels and source responsibly.

[LEARN MORE](sustain)

### EMPOWER

[ Details Close ](#collapse-1928824221)

#### Unemployment and underemployment are some of today‚Äôs most pressing issues, driven by inequality and lack of opportunity

As one of the world‚Äôs fastest growing industries, we are well positioned to be part of the solution. We partner with leading nonprofits to ensure workplace readiness and access to opportunity, focusing on youth, diverse populations, women, people with disabilities, veterans and refugees.

[LEARN MORE](empower)

### WELCOME

[ Details Close ](#collapse-1777948077)

#### Travel is one of the most powerful tools for promoting peace and cultural understanding.

With the goal of creating a safe, welcoming world for all, we rally for pro-travel policies and support programs that allow people to experience and understand other cultures. Through nonprofit partnerships, creating and implementing training, advocacy and supplier accountability, we are committed to uphold and respect human rights..

[LEARN MORE](welcome)

![Beachfront resort, as seen from the ocean](https://serve360.marriott.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/hmpg-goalsperformance-380x380.jpg)

#  TakeCare Relief Fund 

![](/content/dam/marriott-digital/digitallegal-micorp-cec/en_us/micorp_take-care-relief-fund/unlimited/logo/assets-usage-rights/pdt-TCR-Logo-499930096191048.png)

The TakeCare Relief Fund (TCRF) is a charitable fund that makes need-based financial grants available to associates at managed Marriott International locations* who are facing financial hardship caused by a natural disaster or certain other personal hardship events. TCRF is managed by E4E Relief, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Foundation For The Carolinas, a 501(c)(3) public charity. With more than a decade of experience serving clients, E4E Relief is the leading provider of employee disaster and hardship funds in the U.S.

_**[Learn more about](http://takecarerelieffund.e4erelief.org/)**_**how you can contribute to the TakeCare Relief Fund.** * TCRF grants are available to associates at Marriott U.S. managed locations and a growing number of non-U.S. managed locations.

##  Caring for Our Associates 

![New Orleans during a storm]()

###  New Orleans: Shelter During the Storm 

Hurricane Ida made landfall in New Orleans in late August 2021, the exact day of Hurricane Katrina's 16th anniversary. Hurricane Ida's destruction left more than a million people with no electrical power and flash flooding through the entire region. Hadasha and her one-year-old needed to evacuate quickly and were left displaced from their home. The assistance Hadasha received from the TCRF was used for shelter, food, and clothing during their extended evacuation. 

![Hawaii during a storm](https://cache.marriott.com/content/dam/marriott-renditions/dm-static-renditions/digitallegal-micorp-cec/en_us/micorp_take-care-relief-fund/unlimited/photo/assets-usage-rights/pdt-tcr---hawaii-storm-192216575597509-classic-hor.jpg)

###  Hawaii: Flooded with Hope 

Rainfall is common in Kauai, but a strong storm in Wainiha in April 2018 had Brian fleeing his flooded home. After the water receded and Brian surveyed his home, it needed extensive repairs. He reached out to the TCRF and secured a grant to help him rebuild his home and start anew.

![Damaged buildings during the day](https://cache.marriott.com/content/dam/marriott-renditions/dm-static-renditions/digitallegal-micorp-cec/en_us/micorp_take-care-relief-fund/unlimited/photo/assets-usage-rights/pdt-tcr---damaged-buildings-897298923462389-classic-hor.jpg)

###  Nepal: A Helping Hand 

In April 2015, Nepal was rocked by a 7.8 magnitude earthquake and its aftershocks, causing widespread devastation and loss of life. Even though there were no hotels in Nepal, the families of 257 Napalese associates at our properties in 11 contries were impacted.

[ ![Marriott Bonvoy App](/content/dam/marriott-digital/global/partner-logo/en_us/logo/internal/assets/bonvoy-cobrand-logo-bonvoyapp-35445.png) Unlock extraordinary experiences with the Marriott Bonvoy‚Ñ¢ App. Wherever you go, the app gives you easy access to everything you need for your trip.
